mapper.select: SELECT s.uid, s.username, s.email, s.phone, s.uname, s.sex, s.user_img, s.sign_time, deleted, enabled, r.name as role_name FROM users s LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON s.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id=r.role_id order by s.sign_time asc LIMIT ${pageNum},14
select * from role order by role_id asc LIMIT ${pageNum},14
select * from item_details_temp where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid} and isOK=1
select * from item_details_temp where isOK=1 or isOK=2 order by create_time desc LIMIT ${pageNum},10
select * from item_details where isTakeoff=0 order by create_time desc LIMIT ${pageNum},10
select * from item_details where isTakeoff=1 order by create_time desc LIMIT ${pageNum},10
mapper.update: update item_details_temp set isOK=-1,refuse_reason=#{refuse_reason} where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
update item_details set isTakeoff=1 where pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select * from community order by create_time desc LIMIT ${pageNum},10
select * from report_item order by create_time desc LIMIT ${pageNum},14
